When you sit down at a coffee shop to work, what's your go-to order — and does it change based on time of day or weather?
Are you actively studying Spanish right now, and if so, how? (App, tutor, immersion, classes — and how many minutes a day roughly?)
When you're buying something new, how much does a brand's sustainability record actually influence your decision — is it a dealbreaker, a tiebreaker, or more of a nice-to-have?
How would you describe your current wardrobe vibe in 3 words, and is there a brand or two you'd point to as 'this is exactly my style'?
When you need to buy something, how long do you typically research before pulling the trigger — are you a quick-buy person or do you spend days comparing options?
Outside of volleyball, what does a typical week of movement look like for you — any strength training, running, swimming, or stretching built into your routine?
If someone wanted to give you the perfect gift for your birthday, what's one thing you'd actually be excited to receive — and one category of gift you'd rather they skip entirely?
As a digital nomad, how do you currently get around day-to-day in Mexico — walking, scooter, ride-share, bike? And when you're in the US, what's your transportation setup?
What does your ideal workspace look like at home — standing desk, couch, kitchen table? And how important is it that your living space has a dedicated work area?
For Remi — what's her breed, how old is she, and what does her daily care routine look like (walks, feeding schedule, vet cadence)?
What does a social week look like when you feel like things are dialed in — how many days do you want to be doing something with others vs. having fully solo evenings?
What's your morning like before you open your laptop — do you have a consistent ritual, or does it vary day to day?
When you're in a focused work session, what are you listening to — specific playlists, a particular artist, lo-fi, silence, or something else entirely?
Do you have any supplements or vitamins you take daily? If so, what's your current stack and why did you land on those?
When you're not actively building something for work, what hobby or side project gives you the most energy right now?
How do you handle eating out — do you have a go-to set of restaurants you rotate through, or do you explore somewhere new most of the time? And how often do you eat out vs. cook in a typical week?
Tell me about your relationship with alcohol — do you drink, and if so, what are your go-to drinks and in what contexts?
What does your approach to money look like when you're traveling — do you budget trip costs tightly, spend freely, or something in between? And what's the one travel expense you'd never cheap out on?
What's your relationship with cooking? Do you enjoy it as a creative outlet, treat it as a necessary chore, or something in between — and are there specific cuisines or dishes you like to make?

What's your general approach to personal health care — do you go to doctors proactively, only when something feels wrong, or do you handle most things with lifestyle choices and avoid the medical system when possible?
